properties.Description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

identity.Description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

marketplaceSubscriptionStatus.Description: NewRelic Organization properties of the resource

liftrResourcePreference.Description: Liftr resource preference. The priority of the resource.

region.Description: Region where New Relic account is present

enterpriseAppId.Description: The Id of the Enterprise App used for Single sign-on.

singleSignOnUrl.Description: The login URL specific to this NewRelic Organization

usageType.Description: Different usage type like PAYG/COMMITTED. this could be enum

billingCycle.Description: Different billing cycles like MONTHLY/WEEKLY. this could be enum

planDetails.Description: plan id as published by NewRelic

principalId.Description: The service principal ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.Description: The tenant ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

type.Description: Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

userAssignedIdentities.Description: The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.

principalId.Description: The principal ID of the assigned identity.

clientId.Description: The client ID of the assigned identity.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

properties.Description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

logRules.Description: Set of rules for sending logs for the Monitor resource.

metricRules.Description: Set of rules for sending metrics for the Monitor resource.

sendAadLogs.Description: Flag specifying if AAD logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.

sendSubscriptionLogs.Description: Flag specifying if subscription logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.

sendActivityLogs.Description: Flag specifying if activity logs from Azure resources should be sent for the Monitor resource.

filteringTags.Description:
List of filtering tags to be used for capturing logs. This only takes effect if SendActivityLogs flag is enabled. If empty, all resources will be captured.
If only Exclude action is specified, the rules will apply to the list of all available resources. If Include actions are specified, the rules will only include resources with the associated tags.

name.Description: The name (also known as the key) of the tag.

action.Description: Valid actions for a filtering tag. Exclusion takes priority over inclusion.

sendMetrics.Description: Flag specifying if metrics should be sent for the Monitor resource.

filteringTags.Description: List of filtering tags to be used for capturing metrics.

value.Description: The AppServiceInfo items on this page

nextLink.Description: The link to the next page of items

agentVersion.Description: Version of the NewRelic agent installed on the App service.

agentStatus.Description: Status of the NewRelic agent installed on the App service.

value.Description: The VMInfo items on this page

nextLink.Description: The link to the next page of items

agentVersion.Description: Version of the NewRelic agent installed on the VM.

agentStatus.Description: Status of the NewRelic agent installed on the VM.
